course_format: Duration of the course is 40 academic hours. (Usually 5 days).
The course includes approximately 40% hands on lab work.
In the 4 day long version we allocate more time for exercises and have more time for individual help.
objectives: To master the rich set of Python libraries and modules.
Use various advanced programming techniques available in Python.
prerequisites: Experience with the basics of Python

entries: Advanced uses of built-in data types (including slices on sequences).
Functional programming (lambda, map, reduce, filter, zip).
syllabus.title: Data types advanced programming techniques

entries: Overloading (with and without the operator module).
syllabus.title: Object Oriented Programming in Python

entries: Iterators (including sorted and reversed, and use of itertools)
syllabus.title: Iterators and Generators

target_audience: This is an advanced Python course suitable for people who already have Python programming background.
title: Advanced Python Programming
